-- This is auto-generated code
-- Connect to Built in Serverless SQL Pool
-- Connect to nyc_taxi_discovery Database

USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- Select From a Folder

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


-- All Files in 2020 . Select Files from Subfolders

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


 -- No Subfolders Specified
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
   
-- Get Data From More than One File

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv'
                ,'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=03/*.csv' ),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] ;


-- Use More than 1 Wild Card Characters

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] ;

 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] ;


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/*/*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] ;       


-- File Metadata Function filename()

SELECT
    TOP 100  
    result.filename() as file_name,
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] ;

-- How Many Records in Each File

SELECT
    TOP 100  
    result.filename() as file_name,
    count(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] 
    GROUP BY result.filename()
    ORDER BY  result.filename() 

-- Limit Data using filename()

SELECT
    TOP 100  
    result.filename() as file_name,
    count(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] 
    WHERE result.filename() in ( 'green_tripdata_2020-01.csv' ,'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
    GROUP BY result.filename()
    ORDER BY  result.filename() 


-- Use filepath function

SELECT
    TOP 100  
    result.filename() as file_name,
    result.filepath() as file_path,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] 
    WHERE result.filename() in ( 'green_tripdata_2020-01.csv' ,'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
    GROUP BY  result.filepath() ,result.filename()
    ORDER BY  result.filename() 


SELECT
    TOP 100  
    result.filename() as file_name,
    result.filepath(1) as year, -- Position of WildCard  
    result.filepath(2) as month, -- Position of WildCard 
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] 
    WHERE result.filename() in ( 'green_tripdata_2020-01.csv' ,'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
    GROUP BY  result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2) ,result.filename()
    ORDER BY  result.filename() 

--https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/query-specific-files

-- Use filepath() in where clause

SELECT
    TOP 100  
    result.filename() as file_name,
    result.filepath(1) as year, -- 1 here is Position of WildCard  
    result.filepath(2) as month, -- 2 here is Position of WildCard 
    result.filepath(3) as filename, -- 3 here is Position of WildCard 
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result] 
    WHERE result.filepath(1) = '2020'
    AND result.filepath(2)  in ('06','07','08')
    GROUP BY  result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2),result.filepath(3) ,result.filename()
    ORDER BY  result.filename() , result.filepath(1) , result.filepath(2)
